Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
conditioner \conditioner\ n. 1. exercise that conditions the body; as, farmwork can be a good conditioner. [WordNet 1.5]
2. a trainer of athletes. [WordNet 1.5]
3. a substance used in washing (clothing or hair) to make things softer. [WordNet 1.5]
conditioner n 1: exercise that conditions the body; "farmwork can be a good conditioner" 2: a trainer of athletes 3: a substance used in washing (clothing or hair) to make things softer
